You can wait on the world map by holding down the space bar.
You can recruit new men to your party in taverns.
You can give orders to your party while in battle.
A party with high morale moves more quickly while travelling on the map.
Wounded party members will heal faster while resting in taverns.
To quickly buy and sell items in inventory window, hold down control key while you left click.
You can press Backspace key during battle to bring the command interface.
You will pay half wages to your troops while you are staying in a town or castle. Similarly, you will pay half wages to troops you garrison in a castle.
You can leave any location instantly by pressing the tab key.
You can hold down the shift key to zoom-in while aiming at distant enemies.
